nodes.text: Armstiss was a location where the Poporov merchants were situated during the reign of the Galactic Empire. At one point the Poporov merchants of Armstiss rebelled against the Empire, and Captain Strayit and Lieutenant Zertik Strom of the Imperial Navy vessel Marshall Awe were sent to deal with them. The conflict was ended when Strom took a blaster bolt meant for Strayit, and then stuck a thermal detonator down the pants of the leader of the rebels, throwing him off a cliff into his supporters. The resultant explosion destroyed half the merchant stalls in the area, but discouraged any further defiance.

Armstiss was first mentioned in the second part of Viva Space Vegas! The History of the Marvelous Wheel, an article released in 2013 on the StarWars.com Star Wars Blog and written by Abel G. Peña and Rich Handley.
